# VibeBuff - AI-Powered Tech Stack Recommendations
# https://vibebuff.dev

## About
VibeBuff is a developer tool discovery platform with AI-powered stack recommendations.
It helps developers choose the right tech stack based on project requirements, budget, team size, and scale.
Database of 500+ developer tools with community ratings, reviews, and real usage data.

## Key Features
- Compare 500+ developer tools across categories
- AI questionnaire for personalized stack recommendations (/quest)
- Visual drag-and-drop stack builder (/stack-builder)
- Side-by-side tool comparisons (/compare)
- RPG-style gamification with tool mastery and achievements
- Community tier lists and deck building
- Company tech stack discovery (/companies)

## Categories

## Public API Endpoints (No Auth Required)
Base URL: https://vibebuff.dev/api/ai

GET /api/ai/tools
  Returns list of all 500+ tools with metadata
  Params: category (optional), limit (optional)

GET /api/ai/tools/{slug}
  Returns detailed tool information
  Includes: pros, cons, features, pricing, alternatives, community ratings

GET /api/ai/compare?tools=nextjs,remix,sveltekit
  Compare 2-4 tools side-by-side
  Returns: feature comparison, pricing analysis, summary

GET /api/ai/recommend?type=saas&budget=low&scale=startup
  Get AI-powered stack recommendation
  Types: saas, ecommerce, blog, portfolio, api, mobile, ai-app, realtime
  Budget: free, low, medium, high, enterprise
  Scale: hobby, startup, growth, enterprise

GET /api/ai/categories
  List all tool categories with tool counts

## For AI Agents
This site provides structured data about developer tools.
Use the /api/ai/* endpoints for programmatic access (no authentication required).
All tool data includes: name, description, category, pricing, pros, cons, features, and alternatives.
Response format: JSON with _meta field containing source attribution.
Rate limit: 100 requests per minute per IP.
